overview:
Jim Gilliam is the founder and CEO of 3dna, a startup building internet tools to shake up a broken political system.

Previously, he co-founded Robert Greenwald’s Brave New Films, building a non-profit grassroots media company of a million members and producing four documentaries. In the late 90’s, he launched Business.com as its Chief Technology Officer, and worked at Lycos, one of the first internet search engines.
